edge_1: After escaping, Hudgens finds everyone killed by a mysterious creature and the coffin empty.
edge_2: The mysterious creature from the ship attacks and kills a security guard inside the museum.

edge_1: Carnby arrives at the urban museum with an Abkani artifact that he has been studying since his nightmare in which he hides from alien-like creatures as a child.
